ComicInfo.Summary: Total Recall: The Hulk returns from his encounter with the High Evolutionary and dreams of his recent trip to Jarella's world (this is where he was transported when the Gamma bomb went off in issue #345). Even though he is now grey, the Hulk is still greeted as a god and finds that factions are warring over control of his religion.

ComicInfo.Title: Total Recall
